item.description:
Everyone is in charge of doing their own separate $15 Event Registration at this Web address. (<- It's Linked, you can click on it!)

I Plan to do Flights of Fancy this Thursday, and you're welcome to try and joint me for part or all of it.  I go to try the wine though, only so much shopping.

I will go to the start (The Study) right after work and will wait there for people to group up until 5:05pm.  (Or however long it takes to get through the start line.)

You're welcome to group with me, and we can browse a little where people want, but I doubt I'll be spending more than 15 minutes outside of waiting in line at any one place.  Come and go from the group as you please if you want to spend more time somewhere.

Description for those not familiar: Flights of Fancy is a 2-3 times yearly Wine Tasting and Shopping event in Downtown New Haven.

On the day, go to "The Study" any time from 4-7 to sign in, pay your event fee if you're doing Cash, and get a wine glass which is yours to keep. You also should get a MAP, which is very helpful.

From there you walk around downtown going from shop to shop on the provided map of participating stores until 8pm. (Note: I cannot stress enough, PICK UP A MAP!  Ask if they're not obvious.)

Each participating store will pour a wine, and there usually is a discount on purchases made at that store.

At the end of the night there will be Coffee, Dessert, and a Raffle at 8:15 at The Study, where you signed in.

Parking at the York Street Garage is validated if you bring your ticket to the Study at sign in.

AJ's initial plan:

Get to The Study by 5:00. Depart for the first stop at 5:05 or however long it takes to get through the sign-in line.  I'll wait near the Doors/Lobby of the Study until 5:05, maybe a grace period if you've met up with me and are in registration line at that point.

Route: I hit the first couple in the immediate area, (i.e. the Art shops, Willoughby's) then go to the North-East most shop in the Upper Broadway district first and proceed Southerly, then once finished in the Broadway area travel to the South-West most shop on Chapel or Crown (probably Wine Thief) and work our way back N.E. towards The Study. (We will only stop at the shops that are not pouring wine by special request).

Some where along the way I plan to grab a fast bite, we'll see how people feel and how many shops put out food themselves.

If you're going to be late or get lost anywhere then you can try and catch up with us along that path.  My Cell number is 315-345-9348, text me to find out where we are at.

Last year, former NHCer Neil and I did the above and managed to get wine at every store that had not run out.  Though if there's more shopping this time it might not happen again.

If anyone would like to lead alternative groups for different PACE, start times or paths you're welcome to pitch in and we can add the alternatives to the posting.
item.how_to_find_us: If you can't make the 5:00 meeting you'll have to try to catch up on the trail and or text my Cell (315-345-9348). Intended path is listed in the Event.
